feed.title: SimpleX Chat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.3.1
entry.content:
New in v6.3.1: - improved scrolling and navigation in chats. - faster onboarding for the new users. - fixes.

Commits: - docs: add reproducibility section (#5732) - blog: update v6.3 release post (#5733) - ios: fix random crashes in chat on iOS 18 (#5734) - ios: v6.3, build 269 - blog: update v6.3 blog post (#5735) - desktop: fix postgres migration (#5739) - flatpak: update metainfo (#5740) - directory: more permissive captcha rules (#5741) - directory: use lowercase letters in captcha, accept any case for same-looking letters (#5744) - ios: scrolling improvements (#5746) - android, desktop: fix crash on very long quoted message (#5751) - core: exclude CLI modules from client library (#5758) - android, desktop: fix negative content offset on some Android devices (#5752) - android, desktop: open links from notes (#5761) - core: update simplexmq to support PostgreSQL servers (#5760) - android, desktop: menu near top floating button (#5764) - android, desktop: scrolling improvements (#5753) - android, desktop: enhancements to floating buttons (#5763) - ios: moving content up when setting emoji on the first message (#5766) - ios: XCode 16 workaround to prevent stack overflow (#5771) - core: 6.3.1.0 (simplexmq 6.3.1.0) - readme: update SimpleX users group link (#5772) - docs: update server doc about reproducing builds (#5779) - ui: move operators selection to sheet on onboarding (#5783) - directory: joining groups with enabled captcha screening and observer role (#5784) - core: 6.3.1.1 - ios: update core library - ui: translations (#5791) - website: translations (#5792) - 6.3.1: ios 270, android 281, desktop 97

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.3.2
entry.content:
New in v6.3.2: - fix related to backward/forward compatibility of the app in some rare cases.

The GitHub release build is independently reproduced by: | Verifier | Signature | PGP key to verify | | ------- | --------- | ----------------- | | SimpleX Chat team | _sha256sums.asc | FB44AF81A45BDE327319797C85107E357D4A17FC | | Flux team | _sha256sums_flux.asc | F3244FFC7207DB2CAA355DF506139DA3A0B13EC1 |

Huge thanks to Flux for providing their servers via the app!

Commits: - flatpak: update metainfo (#5794) - ios: v6.3.1, build 271 using XCode 15 - core: fix types for PostgreSQL database (#5800) - ci: reproducible builds/refactor (#5808) - directory: allow admins deleting groups and registering groups with the same name as deleted one; /help commands; better support of other group owners; support link encoding and version changes (#5829) - core: 6.3.2.0 (simplexmq 6.3.2.0) - 6.3.2: ios 272, android 283, desktop 98

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.3.3
entry.content:
New in v6.3.3:

  • support for connecting via short connection links.

To create short connection links: - enable Dev Tools, - enable short links in Privacy & Security settings.

Only this and later versions of the app will be able to connect via these short links. Full links compatible with the previous versions are created at the same time, and you can choose which of the links to share.

Please note: if you use self-hosted servers, you need to migrate them to server v6.4.0-beta.1 or later.

The GitHub release build is independently reproduced by: | Verifier | Signature | PGP key to verify | | ------- | --------- | ----------------- | | SimpleX Chat team | _sha256sums.asc | FB44AF81A45BDE327319797C85107E357D4A17FC | | Flux team | _sha256sums_flux.asc | F3244FFC7207DB2CAA355DF506139DA3A0B13EC1 |

Huge thanks to Flux for providing their servers via the app!

Commits: - docs: correction to command - kotlin: refactor chat contexts 1 (remove functions creating indirection) (#5827) - core, ui: short connection links with stored data (#5824) - ci/docker: use Java Corretto (#5832) - flatpak: update metainfo (#5836) - kotlin: refactor chat contexts 2 (null secondary context, pass context instead of content tag, straighten chat state code) (#5830) - android, desktop: enable reactions 😂 and ✅ - core: 6.3.3.0 (simplexmq 6.4.0.1) - website: translations (#5845) - ui: translations (#5843) - core: fix connecting via short links - ci: switch to sha256 and skip 8.10.7 on release (#5837) - core: 6.3.3.1 - 6.3.3: ios 273, android 285, desktop 99

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.3.4
entry.content:
New in v6.3.4: - fixes mentions with trailing punctuation (e.g., hello @name!). - recognizes domain names as links (e.g., simplex.chat). - forward compatibility with "knocking" (a feature for group admins to review and to chat with the new members prior to admitting them to groups, it will be released in 6.4) - iOS improvements: - lots of fixes and improvements for notifications. - fixes bugs from Xcode 16 migration - tapping links, opening images, etc. - opening the links in the browser/any other apps now requires confirmation in all cases. - secrets in messages (e.g., #hidden secret#): shown on tap one by one, new design.

The GitHub release build is independently reproduced by: | Verifier | Signature | PGP key to verify | | ------- | --------- | ----------------- | | SimpleX Chat team | _sha256sums.asc | FB44AF81A45BDE327319797C85107E357D4A17FC |

Commits: - flatpak: update metainfo (#5846) - website: new languages, update some texts (#5849) - docs: dependencies (#5850) - core, ui: option to use web port by default for preset servers only (#5847) - android, desktop: additional information about database errors in console (#5853) - core: use /feed command in broadcast bot (#5854) - directory service: fix deleting group registration (#5856) - ios: refactor chat state (remove chatItemsChangesListener) (#5858) - ios: deliver notifications even if iOS fails to fire expiration notice, prevent repeat delivery of stale notifications (#5861) - ios: remove types used only in the app from the framework (#5866) - core: split response to two types, to improve iOS parsing memory usage (#5867) - core: pass event and response error without dedicated constructor (#5869) - ios: deliver notifications instantly when server has no more messages and better concurrency (#5872) - core: 6.3.4.0 (simplexmq 6.4.0.2) - ios: update core library - ui: translations (#5874) - website: translations, readme: ZEC address (#5875) - ios: v6.3.4 build 274 (internal release) - ios: fix XCode 16 regressions (tap not working on files, quotes, images, voice messages, etc.), open link previews on tap (#5880) - ios: export localizations - ios: 6.3.4 (build 275) - ios: only handle taps on messages with links or secrets, use image for secret markdown (#5885) - ios: unblur media on tap, open/play on the second tap; handle link preview errors (#5886) - core, ui: support trailing punctuation for mentions, URIs (also support domains), and email addresses (#5888) - ios: fix taps on reactions, member profile images, selecting items, icons to navigate to found and forwarded items (Xcode 16 regressions) (#5890) - ui: translations (#5891) - android, desktop: narrow condition for showing reported count toolbar (to avoid showing it to regular members who received reports due to a bug in older version) (#5894) - ios: 6.3.4 (build 276) - website: translations (#5892) - website: translations (#5896) - core: make member admission forwards compatible (#5893) - core: 6.3.4.1 - 6.3.4: ios 277, android 287, desktop 100 - android, desktop: fix sending reports - 6.3.4: android 288, desktop 101

Android APKs:

SHA2-256(simplex-aarch64.apk)= 7c67ab46710ed5386473a3d569433999af7b405ce102d4466ec987b94933e0d2

SHA2-256(simplex-armv7a.apk)= bf41535e757ec58d8eb62aeb20732a40a5b96593762b59764ecd725f59da276b

Desktop apps and CLI

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.3.5
entry.content:
New in v6.3.5: - fixes

The GitHub release build is independently reproduced by: | Verifier | Signature | PGP key to verify | | ------- | --------- | ----------------- | | SimpleX Chat team | _sha256sums.asc | FB44AF81A45BDE327319797C85107E357D4A17FC |
